title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.9 - Performance based conservation financial assistance - Part C
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.9 - Performance based conservation financial assistance - Part C
State Regulations

The State shall provide financial assistance, within amounts
available, to districts that qualify pursuant to performance standards to be
established by the soil and water conservation committee and the commissioner
of the department of agriculture and markets, pursuant to the provisions of
section 11-a(1)(c) of the New York State Soil and Water Conservation Districts

Law. For the purposes of this section the soil and water conservation district
of New York City shall be considered the equivalent of one
district. Notes

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
